bill.title: Statutes relating to public education; delete repealers on certain.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-3-93, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Repealer On The School Crisis Management Program; To Amend Section 37-7-301, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Repealer On The Authority Of Local School Boards To Enter Into Agreements With Other School Boards To Establish Educational Service Agencies; To Amend Section 37-9-77, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Repealer On The School Administrator Sabbatical Program; To Amend Section 37-11-18.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Repealer On The Authority To Expel Habitually Disruptive Students; To Amend Section 37-11-54, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Repealer On The Requirement Of The State Board Of Education To Develop Conflict Resolution And Peer Mediation Materials; To Amend Section 37-11-61, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Repealer On The Requirement Of Local School Districts To Provide Information On Meningococal Disease; To Create The School Start Date Act Of 2010; To Provide That No Public Elementary Or Secondary School Under The Jurisdiction Of The State Board Of Education Shall Begin A New Academic School Year Of Instruction Before September 1; To Exempt The Mississippi Schools For The Blind And Deaf From This Requirement; To Create A New Code Section To Be Codified As Section 43-5-6, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require The State Board Of Education To Establish The Opening And Closing Dates Of The School Term For The Schools For The Blind And Deaf; To Repeal Section 37-13-61, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Local School Board To Fix The Date For The Opening And Closing Of The School Term; And For Related Purposes.
